Entries.DogShopKeeper: Ramen shop - Does not actually sell ramen
Entries.Town-Potat.1: The first batch of a giant sweet potato pie. It smells delicious.
Entries.Town-Potat.3: A fragrant vase of summer flowers.
Entries.Town-Potat.4: The baked sweet potatoes look delicious.
Entries.Town-Potat.5: The table is filled with sweet potato dishes.
Entries.PJRoom.1: Welcome to Welwick's Oracle... I sense that one lucky gamer will be showered with good fortune.
Entries.PJRoom.2: An interesting placement of the bed.
Entries.PJRoom.3: The fridge is filled with salads.
Entries.PJRoom.4: The book is filled with weird challenges.
Entries.PJRoom.6: The barrel is overflowing with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.8: The sack is filled with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.9: The wooden box seems handmade. It's filled to the brim with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.10: The hammer is engraved. It says: Babonk!
Entries.PJShop.1: Fuji looks very comfortable on her bed.
Entries.PJShop.2: It's a poster made by PJ.
Entries.PJShop.3: The shelves are stacked with art supplies.
Entries.PJShop.4: These pots are very well made.
Entries.PJShop.9: PJ's streaming setup. PJ must be pretty serious about streaming.
Entries.PJShop.11: It's a poster of a robot in a spotlight.
Entries.PJShop.12: It's filled with trash.. very unexpected.
Entries.PJShop.15: There's a note on the fridge: DO NOT LOOK INSIDE MY FRIDGE - PJ
Entries.PJShop.16: The cabinet is filled with different cloths for crafting.
Entries.OscarHotel.2: Looks like the guest's mail and room keys are stored here.
Entries.OscarHotel.3: Only hotel guests are allowed upstairs.
Entries.OscarHotel.5: It looks like white is winning.
Entries.OscarHotel.8: So many secrets in this drawer.
Entries.OscarHotel.11: There are blue feathers on some of the eggs.
Entries.OscarHotel.12: Octochef is hard at work, preparing food for everyone.
Entries.OscarHotel.15: The fridge is filled with food from Gil's.
Entries.OscarHotel.16: The milk must be from Oscar's cows.
Entries.OscarHotel.17: Who would eat cookies for breakfast?
Entries.OscarHotel.19: There's a clown's nose stuffed in the drawer.
Entries.Town.2: Sweet Potato Mart Open 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Closed Wednesdays

Entries.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like JP cleans his trash bin regularly.
Entries.Mines_Overrun: This area is overrun with monsters.
Entries.Mines_Shaft: If you saw a hole in a cave, would you jump into it?
Entries.Railroad_TrainComing: The forever train is passing through Stardew Valley
Entries.Town_SeedShopSign:
- Sweet Potato Mart -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!
Entries.Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of King Bozo's old pickup truck...
Entries.Caroline_Sunroom_Door: Jil only lets her friends enter here...
Entries.AnimalShop_MoneyBox: I'm visiting the island today. If you need to buy anything, just leave the money in this box!^     -Oscar
Entries.Saloon_MoneyBox: I'm tending the bar on Ginger Island today, but I won't let that stop you from buying something!^     -Bobby

Entries.Object.cs.13078: Gunther will thank you for the cheeky dono if you donate it to the museum.
Entries.Event.cs.1068: PJ charged me {0}g for the rescue.
Entries.Event.cs.1070: I have no money, but PJ was obligated to save my life free of charge.
Entries.Event.cs.1584: Your grange display has been judged. Return to King Bozo for the result!
Entries.Event.cs.1597: Wow, I got a low score. I guess King Bozo isn't much of a fish man. Oh well...$s
Entries.Event.cs.1600: That was some strange-looking purple lettuce in your grange display!$h#$b#I swear, It looked just like King Bozo' special und... $3#$b#Oh!... heh... nevermind!$4
Entries.Event.cs.1761: ...You're right. Oliver... Ugh, God... I'm a horrible, *hic*... selfish person.$7#$b#Now I feel even worse...$7
Entries.Farmer.cs.1918: You received 15 Parsnip Seeds!^^'Here's a little something to get you started.^-King Bozo'
Entries.NPC.cs.3990: A human visitor? This is most unusual...#$e#I'm Sad Ghost, merchant of rare and exotic goods.
Entries.GameLocation.cs.8525: Come back when Gil's tending the shop.
Entries.MapPage.cs.11093: Home of George, Evelyn & Buff Buoy
Entries.MapPage.cs.11095: Home of Robin, Bababooey, Sebastian & Maru
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11508: *sigh*... When the door opened I thought it might be Lewis.
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11514: Welcome to the Stardrop Saloon! What can I get ya?
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If King Bozo is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12055: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my dear. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If King Bozo is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.MultiplayerUtility.cs.12488: Your grange display has been judged. Return to King Bozo for the result!
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13228: The local {0} population is starting to threaten other species. If you can fish {1} of them for me, it would be a big help.   -Bababooey
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13248: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fisherman who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -Lannery Storm
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13251: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fishing enthusiast who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -Lannery Storm
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13311:
Greetings! Bababooey here. Could someone please bring me {0}?
I'm studying them as part of my biological research.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13314: Looking to dissect {0}. Please deliver to Bababooey at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13317: Howdy neighbors! My goats are really hankerin' for {0}. I can't find any myself! Help?     -Oscar
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13320: Howdy neighbors! I want to try giving my cows {0} to increase their milk production. If you find one could you swing it by for me?.     -Oscar
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13446: A paste of fresh {0} makes a great paint pigment {1}. If you find one, I could put it to good use.       - PJ
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13462: Hi! I need {0} for a new pizza I'm thinking about. Drop one off at the saloon and I'll be very grateful.     -Bobby
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13546: I require {0} for potion-making. Please deliver directly to my study.     -Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13548: Tiny Planet Explorer wishes to study the arcane properties of the {0}. You will be rewarded.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13553: Local astronaut in search of a fresh {0}.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13568: Need {0} for a project I'm working on.    -JP
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13571: Looking for a buddy to bring me {0}.       -JP
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13574: I would like a cute girl to bring me {0}.  (^_-)      -JP
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13580: Need {0} for my latest project. Help!    -Paul
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13583: I need {0} to power my latest invention. It's the ONLY thing that will work!       -Paul
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13688: - You can keep the ores after Clunt inspects them.
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13747: An invasive crab species is living in the local mine, threatening the native wildlife! These creatures are known for disguising themselves as stones. I'll pay someone to slay {0} of them.  -Bababooey
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing the elemental balance into disarray. I would like an adventurer to enter the mines and slay {1} of these {2}.  -Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.WeedingQuest.cs.13816: Hiring someone to weed the entire town. Once all the weeds are gone, report to King Bozo for payment. Thanks!
Entries.TriedToMarryButKrobus: You can't propose to someone while living with a housemate.
Entries.KrobusShopGone: I'm away. Please leave your payment in the box. -Sad Ghost

Entries.Morris_PlayerSignedUp: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.#$b#Now, let me call King Bozo and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Entries.Morris_ComeBackLater: Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.
Entries.Morris_Greeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#I don't believe we've met. I'm Fuzzwald, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.#$b#When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_MembershipAvailab: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... King Bozo promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_MembershipAvailable: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... King Bozo promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Gil's the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#I'm glad Gil's stock is starting to expand again.#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Gil's the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where Gil found that thing.$s#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#The quality was decent.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Gil was selling that {5} for so cheap...
Entries.PurchasedItem_4: So I was at the store the other day and Gil showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I bought it.$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from Gil's shop the other day. #$b#He said that he grew the thing in his own backyard. I didn't know Gil was such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like you might have some competition, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Cooking: I bought the tastiest {2} from Gil's shop the other day. #$b#He said he cooked the thing himself using local ingredients. I didn't know Gil was such {3} {4} chef!
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from Gil's shop the other day. He said he found it himself while exploring the mountains. I didn't know Gil was such a talented forager!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Elliott: I saw that Gil had fresh {2} in the shop the other day! Marvelous. It smelled just perfect... and firm, too!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at Gil's. It was perfect on a bed of greens and a dash of my 'special' vinaigrette.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh_Willy: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Lannery's the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh! #$b#So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#He told me you caught it yourself... I'm impressed!#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow_Willy: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Lannery's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you caught it yourself! #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... and, uh... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where you found that thing...$s#$e#Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow_Willy: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It smelled kind of fishy, but it was alright.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude_Willy: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Lannery was practically giving that {5} away...
Entries.PurchasedItem_4_Willy: So I was at Lannery's other day and he showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I cooked it up for dinner with some lemon and a side of rice pilaf. Pretty good!$h

Entries.Willy_Objective_1_Text: Place the bug meat in the barrel next to Lannery's house.
Entries.Pierre_Objective_1_Text: Place the crops in the empty produce box in Gil's shop.
Entries.Gus_Text: {Greeting}... but I'll need two dozen eggs. Any takers?                -Bobby
Entries.Gus_Objective_1_Text: Put the eggs in Bobby's fridge.
Entries.Wizard_Text: I seek an extremely rare and powerful goop, known as 'ectoplasm'. It can be found in the remains of slain ghosts.      - Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.Wizard_Objective_0_Text: Deliver an ectoplasm to the Explorer
Entries.Clint_Text: The number of {Monster:LocalizedName} in the local caves have made mining dangerous... for other people, not me! There's good money for anyone willing to slay 50 of them.          -Clunt
Entries.Linus_Text: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?                     -Nintendad
Entries.Wizard2_Text: I require assistance in tracking down the rare and dangerous prismatic slime, within the local caves. Bring me a jar of its prismatic jelly and you will be duly rewarded.        -Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a prismatic jelly to the Explorer
